author: Shaurya Malwa
title: SOL, XRP, DOGE Lead Altcoin Recovery After $1B Weekend Liquidation
description: Majors are stabilizing, and bitcoin regained $101,000 after falling under six-figures last night as U.S. airstrikes on Iran triggered a brutal $1 billion flush-out.
content:
Crypto traders are in a rebound mode after the panic selling over the weekend, triggered by U.S. military strikes on Irans nuclear facilities, forced massive liquidations.
